title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: Online Training Program for Movement Disorder Assessment Specialists

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can classify types of movement disorders with 85% accuracy by interpreting clinical motion analysis data.
Learners can create personalized rehabilitation plans for patients using standardized assessment tools.
Learners can generate joint range-of-motion measurement reports by operating biomechanical analysis software.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
